mapper.select: select q.quest_no, q.quest_title, q.quest_reg_date, q.quest_ans_check, m.real_name from QUESTION q, MEMBER m where q.quest_writer = m.member_no and m.member_no = ${member_no};

select * from (select rownum rn, quest_id, quest_no, quest_type, quest_title, quest_writer, quest_contents, quest_reg_date, QUEST_UPDATE_DATE, quest_ans_check, quest_deleted from (select * from question order by lpad(quest_id, 10, '0') desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: insert into QUESTION(quest_id, quest_no, quest_type, quest_title, quest_writer, quest_contents, quest_reg_date, quest_ans_check, quest_deleted) values ('quest'||quest_id_seq.nextval, quest_no_seq.nextval, #{quest_type}, #{quest_title}, #{quest_writer}, #{quest_contents}, sysdate, #{quest_ans_check}, #{quest_deleted})

select quest_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into QUESTION (quest_no, quest_title, quest_writer, quest_contents) values (#{quest_no}, #{quest_title}, #{quest_writer}, #{quest_contents})
